owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

exchangeRouter().notice: The address of the router; this can be pancake or uniswap depending on the network

launchingFeeInTokenA().notice: The percentage fee for raised funds in the partner token (only applicable for successful sales) (100 = 1%)

launchingFeeInTokenB().notice: The percentage fee for raised funds in the raised token (only applicable for successful sales) (100 = 1%)

listingFee().notice: The flat fee in BNB (1e18 = 1 BNB)

maxSaleTime().notice: If set, the maximum amount of time a sale has to run for

minCapRatio().notice: The ratio of soft cap to hard cap, i.e. 50% means soft cap must be at least 50% of the hard cap

minSaleTime().notice: The minimum amount of time in seconds a sale has to run for

validate(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: Validates the parameters against the data contract
